p: Coarse‐scale (1°) general circulation model (GCM) climate grids were collected from the National Center for Atmospheric Research's (NCAR) Community Climate System Model version 4 (CCSM4) for near surface (2 m) T min, T max, T ave, precipitation, short wave radiation ( I cloud), and wind (U, V; Gent et al., 2011; Kluzek, 2011). All climate surfaces were pooled into two 30‐year averages, ~18,000–18,030 ya (years ago; t 1) for the LGM and 1975–2005 ( t 2) for modern climate. All GCM surfaces were reprojected to the Alaska Albers Equal Area Conic projection and resampled to 60‐m resolution using bilinear interpolation. The wind speed vector surfaces were converted to wind speed and direction.
